messages.title: A Conservative majority government can get on with the country's priorities
messages.content: Get Brexit done with a deal – we've agreed a deal with the EU. And it's ready to go from day one of a new parliament. It protects jobs, trade, workers' rights and environmental standards. And it ends the uncertainty.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Get Brexit done with a deal.
£33.9 billion extra for the NHS to help fund 40 new hospitals and invest in 300 new MRI machines, CT scanners and breast-screening machines.
20,000 extra police officers and trusting our police with the powers they need to make our streets safer.
More funding for every pupil in every school so every child gets a better education, no matter what.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Just a handful of votes could decide this seat. So this election will be very close. And your local vote in Reading West will make the difference.

issues.brexitEurope: Get Brexit done with a deal – we've agreed a deal with the EU. And it's ready to go from day one of a new parliament. It protects jobs, trade, workers' rights and environmental standards. And it ends the uncertainty.
issues.education: More funding for every pupil in every school so every child gets a better education, no matter what.
issues.governance: Don't risk another hung parliament. Secure the majority government our country needs so we can focus on the NHS, police and schools. Vote Conservative.
issues.health: £33.9 billion extra for the NHS to help fund 40 new hospitals and invest in 300 new MRI machines, CT scanners and breast-screening machines.

contactInformation.address: CCHQ, 4 Matthew Parker Street, London, SW1H 9HQ

images.caption: A Conservative majority government can get on with the country's priorities

leaflet.additionalNotes: Your name and address were obtained from the Register of Electors, provided to us as registered Political Party and under the Representation of the People Act for the purposes of democratic engagement. If you do not wish to receive future messages from the Conservative Party please contact us.
